title: Lightweight, Fast & Responsive
text: The Duckman template is designed for seamless use, requiring no modifications at the component level unless you wish to customize its default styling.

section.title: Why Tailwind CSS?
section.content: Tailwind CSS provides a highly flexible utility-first approach, allowing for rapid and consistent styling without leaving your HTML.

section.title: Why Styled-Components?
section.content: Styled-Components offers complete control over component styling, enabling scoped styles with dynamic theming for a polished UI.
